items.title: Video Production for E-Learning
items.headline: Learn how to produce E-Learning videos to effectively support student engagement and retention.
objectives_summary: You will understand the benefits of video based learning, the different styles available and when each video style should be used.
You will be able to apply the ADDIE Instructional design model to a video production project, providing a structure to the learning material.
You will be able to effectively work with Subject matter experts, producing a script and storyboard following Instructional design guidelines.
